css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-decd15c3-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px;z-index:2;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;min-width:initial;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-decd15c3-u{padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-decd15c3-u{padding-right:0px;padding-left:0px;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;flex-basis:fit-content;order:3;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-decd15c3-u nav ul{-moz-column-gap:20px;column-gap:20px; row-gap:10px; justify-content: flex-start;}}
